amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to establish a national network for manufacturing innovation that leverages private and public sector investments for proven United States based manufacturing industries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 455 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 455 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Brown.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 455 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 455 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Brown.
